sentences.sentence: Again Capello was demonstrating the usefulness that international friendlies can have when taken seriously.
sentences.translation: 卡佩罗再次证明了友谊赛是有用的，应该认真对待。

sentences.sentence: There were also a couple of international friendlies that involved long journeys which interrupted me getting shape.
sentences.translation: 而且在此期间我还参加了几个国际足球友谊赛，这些长途跋涉都不利于我状态的恢复。

sentences.sentence: He added: "I am disappointed to be out for the friendlies but I will be watching the games and supporting the team."
sentences.translation: 他补充说：“缺席友谊赛我很失望，但我会观看比赛并为球队加油助威。”
